name: Creamy Strawberry Shortcake Delight
instructions: 1. Place a slice of pound cake on a serving plate.
2. Spread a layer of whipped cream on top of the cake.
3. Arrange the sliced strawberries over the whipped cream.
4. Top with another layer of whipped cream.
5. Garnish with a strawberry on top.
description: Creamy Strawberry Shortcake Delight is a refreshing and light dessert that combines layers of velvety whipped cream, sweet and juicy strawberries, and soft pound cake for a delightful treat.
